stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
title: Sūnya
